topic.title: Installing the Oracle Solaris Guest Additions

body.p: If the CD-ROM drive on the guest does not get mounted, as seen with some versions of Oracle Solaris 10, run the following command as root: svcadm restart volfs
Change to the directory where your CD-ROM drive is mounted and run the following command as root: pkgadd -G -d ./VBoxSolarisAdditions.pkg
Choose 1 and confirm installation of the Guest Additions package. After the installation is complete, log out and log in to X server on your guest, to activate the X11 Guest Additions.
